Articles.Content: So I wanted to use one of my premade planes but now when I try to fly them, they just spin out and go wild. Also I do use cheats in my science save cause why not. Though I only use Unbreakable Joints, No crash damage, Inf Electricity and Inf Propellant. I have accidentally click on the physics tab but went back. So I don't think I changed the aerodynamics myself as they worked the last time I play KSP. Was there a change I wasn't aware about? Also running 1.4.1

No aerodynamics changes were made in version 1.4.x.

Your description of the problem is extremely vague, but next time you fly a plane, try pressing alt+X. That zeroes out your "trim", which is something like a fixed amount of steering you can set. If you accidentally added trim, then that would result in your planes constantly trying to veer off in one direction.
